messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/28/00 5:29:40 PM Central Standard Time, CLegath@...
writes:

<< Good friends, school spirit, hair-dos you'd like to forget.
Classmates.com has them all. And with 4.4 million alumni already
registered, there's a good chance you'll find your friends here:
http://click.egroups.com/1/2623/7/_/448294/_/954286131/ >>

LOL!
Does anyone else find it ironic that the ad at the bottom of a message on the
unschooling list was the above? I got a good chuckle out of it!
